tips.title: Timing Tips
tips.tip1: Eat every 3-4 hours to maintain stable blood sugar
tips.tip2: Have your largest meal during the most active part of your day
tips.tip3: Stop eating 2-3 hours before bedtime for better sleep

sampleRecipe.name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
sampleRecipe.description: A fresh and vibrant salad perfect for lunch or dinner
instructionsList: In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion.
Add olives and feta cheese to the mixture.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Let sit for 10 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.
